T02TD2740E:127a-1: bhatt'a r'a ka ma h'a k'a ru ni ka sto tra /
T02TD2740E:127a-3: rje btsun thugs rje chen po la bstod pa /
T02TD2740E:127a-4: thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2740E:127a-5: spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje can //
T02TD2740E:127a-6: skyon gyis ma gos sku mdog dkar //
T02TD2740E:127a-7: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan can //
T02TD2740E:127a-8: thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro la gzigs //
T02TD2740E:127a-9: spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2740E:127a-10: thugs rje dang ni shes rab gnyis //
T02TD2740E:127a-11: mnyam par sbyor ba'i thugs mnga' zhing //
T02TD2740E:127a-12: phyag gnyis thugs kar mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD2740E:127a-13: dpal ldan mnyam sbyor la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2740E:127a-14: sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po gtso //
T02TD2740E:127a-15: gsang sngags rgyal po'i bgrang phreng mchog / mu tig ltar dkar g-yas na 'dzin //
T02TD2740E:127b-1: dag pa'i shel ltar 'od gsal ba //
T02TD2740E:127b-4: chos dbyings rnams dag dri ma dag / zla ba'i 'od ltar rgyal ba'i yum //
T02TD2740E:127b-5: gzugs kyi lha mo yid 'ong sku //
T02TD2740E:127b-6: yig drug ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2740E:127b-7: mtha' yas 'od ldan gser mdog can //
T02TD2740E:127b-8: yid bzhin nor bu chen po ltar //
T02TD2740E:127b-9: sems can re 'dod skong mdzad pa //
T02TD2740E:127b-11: rang bzhin mi dmigs stong pa'i dang //
T02TD2740E:127b-13: gsang sngags ngo bo shes rab bskyed //
T02TD2740E:127b-14: rig sngags che la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2740E:127b-15: rje bcun thugs rje chen po la bstod pa dge slong ma dpal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
